item.title: Thoughts on the pandemic and the vaccine
item.description: My goal in this post is to write down my reasons for not taking the vaccine (as of today). This is a heated conversation currently, and I’m seeing a lot of people being unnecessarily extreme in their comments on the subject. Here’s an example coming from a very smart person: I want to try and avoid such biased and extreme stances, and make my decisions while considering both sides of any issue.

item.title: Why I Write
item.description: Why do I write, and why do I publish on this lame page that nobody knows about? Let’s see if I can explain. I’m hoping that writing this piece will help me understand why I write in general. I think the answer is: ego. I am reminded of this movie called Revolver by Guy Ritchie, the director of Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels and Snatch, among others. The movie is a kind of complicated metaphor about the invisible power of the ego.

item.title: Housing Madness
item.description: My wife found a house she likes for sale today. Asking price around $550K. House has been on the market for one day. The realtor told her there are already 60 visits scheduled. There are only 2 spots left. You only get 15 mins, and only one person can visit per household. This is nuts.
